subject: affiliates, lost money?
description_text:
Hey Simsonn Team,

I noticed you work with MpowR and Sim Racing Corner quite a lot. Getting affiliates who publicize your gear is huge for growing your audience.

The only issue was that I couldn't find that many YouTube reviews on your products. They were either poorly made or didn't get the full point across. Matter of fact, there were about 11 reviews with a total average view count of 12k this past year. This could negatively affect sales and, most importantly, product reputation.

This is why at Trijeto, we help brands that wish to get their premium racing products out to the right audience by elevating their product reviews via social media content. Whether it be YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.

If interested, would you like me to send you an outline of potential outcomes and how they could benefit the overall brand?

Best,
Abdullah
Trijeto

conversations.body_text: May I ask what kind of assistance you can provide?

Hi,

We at Trijeto connect sim racing brands with high-performing creators. This is how we do it.

We will first need to know what your requirements would be in terms of the creator's follower count, niche, and average views required, along with your budget. Once this is established, we present you with some potential creators that we feel could be a good fit.

Whenever possible, send us a list regarding the brand's requirements, as well as your budget.

Best,
Abdullah
Trijeto

Hi Abdullah Mohamedali,    Each recent video has garnered over 10,000 views, with at least four videos posted per month.  Budget is unlimited. Please send us a list of eligible creators for evaluation, after which we can discuss pricing.

Hey,

Thanks for your patience. Please give us a few days while we see which creators are open for collaboration.

Best,
Abdullah
Trijeto

-------- Original Message --------

Hey Simsonn Team,

Thank you for your patience. Here is a proposal for a creator we are currently in touch with.

Creator Overview
Platform: YouTube
Average Views Per Video This Past Month: 47,000
Content Type: Racing Compilation Videos
Upload Rate: Weekly, Every Wednesday, 4 Videos Uploaded This Past Month

Deliverables
1x YouTube Video (Ad Integrate Into The Middle Of The Video, 15-45 Seconds)

Timeline
Filming Completion: To Be Determined
Draft Review: To Be Determined
Publishing Date: To Be Determined

Pricing
Total Cost: To Be Determined

If all the above checks out, reply "Approved" and I'll finalise everything.

Also, could you kindly answer the following:

- Regarding the ad, would you like it to talk about the Simsonn website, a specific product, or something else?
- Would you like to provide an affiliate link so that we could track clicks, conversions, and revenue?
- The creator does not speak or show their face in videos. Could you provide video footage/photos of what you would like promoted?

Looking forward to hearing from you. If you have any questions, please feel free to reach out.

Best
Abdullah
Trijeto

-------- Original Message --------

Hey Simsonn Team,

Wasn't sure if my email reached your inbox, so this is a follow-up. Just a heads up, our creator is ready to go. Just need that green light from you.

Best,
Abdullah
Trijeto

Hey Simsonn Team,

We have found a creator that fits the requirements you provided. Kindly review the outline sent previously. If all looks good, reply with "approved" so we may advance.

If now isnâ€™t the right time, just let us know.

Best,
Abdullah
Trijeto
